Html:
I am currently looking for a graph layout solution for my research work and Graph# is really cool. I have tried to download the source codes and opened them with VS 2008 Express. There are some errors like "Solution folder are not supported in this version of application" and "Solution folder "Libraries" will be displayed as unavailable." The GraphSharp.Test is also not showned correctly.

Since I am not quite familiar with the graphic objects, it would be nice if anyone can provide me with simple examples which can show key features of GraphSharp and QuickGraph.

Thanks

The errors are basically what it says: you got the express version, some of the features found in this solution aren't supported. These features, however, are not needed to succesfully build a binary, so you can continu as is.

For examples, please see the source code, as there is one there. GraphSharp doesn't provide more examples. It would be nice if it did though. Anyhow, if you have any questions, just ask here.
